text: Don Alden Adams (January 16, 1925 - December 30, 2019) was an American Jehovah's Witnesses leader. He was president of the Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania from 2000 to 2014. The organization is the main legal body used around the world by Jehovah's Witnesses. Adams was born in Oak Park, Illinois. Adams died in December 2019, at the age of 94.Aktualisierungen zur 1986 ver√∂ffentlichten Dissertation "Die Zeugen Jehovas"Don Alden Adams death notice ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American Christians Category:Christian religious leaders Category:Jehovah's Witnesses people Category:People from Oak Park, Illinois
